General.Name: Keyware Technologies NV
General.Description: Keyware Technologies NV, an independent fintech company, provides electronic payment solutions in Belgium. It offers payment transaction software for banks and financial institutions, tokenization software, instalment payment solutions, and ordering and payment app software; and payment processing and management services, as well as rents and sells payment terminals. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Zaventem, Belgium.

2.Name: Mr. Joris  Maes
2.Title: Chief Commercial Officer- Keyware Terminals & Transactions
